view.name: system, basic, detailed, video, grid, gamecarousel

text.name: TextDescLong
text.text: Windows is a group of several proprietary graphical operating system families developed and marketed by Microsoft. Each family caters to a certain sector of the computing industry. Active Windows families include Windows NT and Windows IoT; these may encompass subfamilies (e.g. Windows Server or Windows Embedded Compact/Windows CE).

text.name: TextDescShort
text.text: Windows is a group of several proprietary graphical operating system families developed and marketed by Microsoft.
